alert.note: Alert for Creek (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 8:00PM CDT until May 05 at 11:08PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Polecat Creek near Sapulpa affecting Creek County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Polecat Creek near Sapulpa. * WHEN...Until late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, moderate flooding affects pasturelands and oil fields between Sapulpa and the Tulsa County line. Barns and other outbuildings experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:44 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 24.9 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
